p: Statistical comparison with multiple comparisons was made using one-way ANOVA ( p < 0.05), followed by post hoc Tukey's honest significant difference test. For statistical comparison of two groups before and after aHSCT a paired Student's t-test was used. The level of significance is indicated by * p < 0.05 was considered to be significantly different, where indicated, ** p < 0.01, and *** p < 0.001. Unless otherwise indicated, the error bars represent SEM.
